divs: sighting detailsme and my frend (we both saw the same thing) saw 3 lights very far away looking in the sky while we were at my girlfrends dads house, it is around 3 miles north east of given adress, i dont know if you want my address or adress of sighting, adress of sighting was on school road just passed flynn road on left heading east. they appeared as 3 lights or points with 2 closer together on the left ( middle one about 25 degrees of the way between them from left) and they were either all one craft moving extremely fast directly away from us or 3 seperate objects moving away in formation or 3 seperate objects getting closer together in the same ratio or respect or proximity to each other (looked like if you zoom out with a camera) and dimmer. then they disappeared. the first part you just read we saw for around 4 secondts. then they dissapeared. we jumped up on the back of a pickup truck to see farther over the tree line because they got closeish to the treeline when they dissapeared. and we saw nothing for around 3 seconds. then we saw one appear and then another appear then the first start to fade while another was appearing then the second 2 fully appeared just as the first faded out then the 2nd one started to fade as the 3rd was still bright and the 3rd fade just as the first two had before. it could have been 6 seperate objects because we saw 3 points in 2 defferent places but not at the same time, im just saying if they were 3 objects at our estimated distance they must have went out then accelorated incredibly fast then decelorated so fast that nothing i can think of could have survived the g force involved. a person would be nothing but splat after a ride like that. ok as far as your "points" we were stripping out a classic bmw to sell parts off of all day since around 11 am, we finished that for the day so we were just relaxing, dave (my girlfrend)'s dad was selling a truck so we went outside to watch him haggle. and we saw em we went stepping back towards the east as the other 3 people walked north west towards the house we saw it then jumped on the truck and then i said "holy s**t theres your ufo right there" the whole time from when i saw it to when i was on the back of the truck was around 8 seconds, then i saw it again then said that just as they dissapeared, the other 3 looked and it was too late so they were laughing at us because i was really serious when i said it so they must think im nuts, well the 2 people that were there to buy the truck sure did but mabey not autumns dad he might have believed me. when i first saw the object it looked like a really bright but small sunset then i noticed the points i think i covered the movements and actions adrenalin rush and extreme extacy like it made me feel so happy to have actually saw something i have been so interested in for the first time. i have been researching and reading\watching about ufo's for years but i have never seen anything like what i just did, this is the first thing i have ever seen that i can not just explain to myself, like it was a miracle that god must have created, like something that just cant happen. they slowly lighted and faded 1 at a time then we watched for 5 minutes after and never saw another thing. ask me all the questions you want, we both will participate in whatever, you can interrogate us and criticise us and we will hold our story. oh by the way, i havent plotted it on a map yet but there is a dopplar weather radar ball on the corner of c-38 and passenhiem road in the general direction we werre looking, but the ball is a bit farther than my distance estamet, help me with the geography and triginomitry.
